youtube.title: Baby Development Week by Week | Complete Pregnancy Stages Explained
youtube.description: Watch the amazing 40-week journey of a baby's development in the womb. This time-lapse visualization covers everything from conception to birth, making complex biology easy to understand. Perfect for students and expecting parents! Subscribe for more biology insights.
